info.name: 孙运莲
info.profile: Yunlian Sun is currently an Associate Professor at the Nanjing University of Science and Technology. She received the B.S. degree from Northeast Normal University in 2008, the M.E. degree from Harbin Institute of Technology in 2010, and the Ph.D. degree from University of Bologna (Italy) in 2014. During the Ph.D. study, she worked as a research fellow at University of Sassari (Italy). After the Ph.D. study, she worked as a postdoctoral researcher at National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Her research interests include biometrics, pattern recognition, and computer vision. She has served as a reviewer for journals including IEEE TPAMI, IEEE TIFS, IEEE TCSVT, PR, IVC, PRL, etc.
info.direction: 生物特征识别、模式识别、计算机视觉
info.profile_c: 南京理工大学计算机科学与工程学院副教授、硕士生导师。2008年毕业于东北师范大学计算机科学与技术专业，获学士学位。2010年毕业于哈尔滨工业大学计算机科学与技术专业，获硕士学位。2014年月毕业于意大利博洛尼亚大学电子工程、信息和通信专业，获博士学位，读博期间在意大利萨萨里大学进行合作研究。2014年11月至2017年5月在中科院自动化所模式识别国家重点实验室从事博士后研究工作。2018年入选江苏省“双创博士”。目前担任IEEE TPAMI、TIFS、TCSVT、PR、IVC等国际著名期刊审稿人。研究方向主要包括生物特征识别、模式识别、计算机视觉 等。
